body: So I don't know how many of you guys have heard of it but I just saw that scientists revealed a doomsday clock telling you how long the earth has until the "BIG DISASTER" of nuclear weapons, new technology and climate changes.<br id="null"><br id="null">Opinions?<br id="null">

title: Doomsday Clock

replies.body: Well, there is going to be a MidnightStorm. =P
replies.body_tagged: Well, there is going to be a MidnightStorm. =P

replies.body: In all seriousness, there is no way to predict a nuclear war. Scientists predicted that the Cuban Missile Crisis during the Cold War would be the beginning of a nuclear war, but they were (thankfully) wrong about that.
replies.body_tagged: In all seriousness, there is no way to predict a nuclear war. Scientists predicted that the Cuban Missile Crisis during the Cold War would be the beginning of a nuclear war, but they were (thankfully) wrong about that.

replies.body:
They aren't credible scientists, they're just mentally crazy people living in their parent's basement trying to stir up drama for attention. 

I don't touch doomsday stuff within a 10 foot pole.
replies.body_tagged:
They aren't credible scientists, they're just mentally crazy people living in their parent's basement trying to stir up drama for attention. 

I don't touch doomsday stuff within a 10 foot pole.

replies.body: They probably hang around with that physicist that claimed that there was life on Mars that was wiped out by a nuclear catastrophe.

replies.body:
Seriously? Another one of these?

It's as if you guys WANT the world to end. No one can predict when the next Nuclear war will begin, only politicians can because they're the ones that control the nukes.

Seriously, stop this. It's annoying and depressing.
